item.title: Machine Learning and Software Engineering

item.title: Acorn Aspirations
item.description: I work with Acorn Aspirations I’ve created an AI learning platform to empower young people with technical AI skills and knowledge. My workshops were part of the AI bootcamp for TeensInAI. I have written Jupyter Notebooks which: Use modern tooling (Python, Tensorflow, Jupyter) Teach the fundamentals (Linear Algebra, Calculus, Neural Nets, etc) Set practical challenges (Create a Neural Net to classify images) My Notebooks are designed for Google’s Colaboratory (a powerful, free, AI research environment), find them on GitHub.

item.description: DIY RC Planes Carbon Fibre TriCopter

item.title: About
item.description: High school drop out, self-actualization opt-in. AI learning platform creator AI consultancy In the next few months I’m creating and teaching an AI masterclass. In the next few years I’m hoping to work as an AI engineer. Just beginning my path into London’s tech startup culture.

item.title: Why I Do This
item.description: Why I left school (at aged 15, UK Year 10) My time and mental energy were being used unproductively The GCSE system forced me to work towards achieving a high-average I aspire to achieve great things but structured mass schooling will erode my competitiveness and demotivate me I don’t mind failing, because it gains you a visible, quantifiable error from which to learn Why I learn ML It’s the future and it’s cutting-edge I enjoy the construction of a project/system (of models, maths and computational systems) Potential to make a big positive contribution to the nation of Earth.
